title: This Bitcoin-Led, Institutionally Anchored Cycle Shows the Three-Month Drop Isn’t a Winter: Glassnode
contentSnippet: Glassnode and Fasanara’s year-end report shows record inflows, rising realized cap, and falling volatility, suggesting the latest pullback is a mid-cycle reset rather than the start of a long downturn

title: ゲンスラー前SEC委員長「仮想通貨は投機的」　ビットコイン除く全トークンに警告
contentSnippet: ゲンスラー前SEC委員長がブルームバーグのインタビューで、ビットコインを除くすべての仮想通貨を「極めて投機的」と評価。退任後も投資家保護の重要性を強調し、規制の観点からビットコインのみをコモディティとして区別する姿勢を維持している。

title: HashPortウォレット、Pontaポイントでステーブルコインの購入が可能に
contentSnippet: HashPortは12月1日、HashPort WalletでPontaポイントをBase上のUSDCやcbBTCに交換できる「オンランプ」機能と、暗号資産をau PAYギフトカードに変換する「オフランプ」機能を開始した。

title: Dogecoin Posts Strongest Move in Weeks. Is $0.15 the Next Target?
contentSnippet: Key resistance levels were tested, with momentum indicators supporting continued bullish movement.

title: $6.5K Ether Bets Dominate Deribit Open Interest
contentSnippet: The $6,500 call option on Deribit is the most popular, with a notional open interest of over $380 million.

title: Crypto treasuries lead stock recovery after shaky start to December
contentSnippet: Digital asset treasury stocks surged Tuesday, with Ether-focused firms leading gains up to 12.35% as crypto markets rebounded from the sell-off.

title: Gunmen Steal $85,800 in Trinidad Crypto Ambush as Attacks on Holders Rise
contentSnippet: Armed robberies of crypto buyers are rising globally as criminals abandon digital hacks for brutal in-person confrontations.

title: BlackRock’s top brass says tokenization will bridge crypto and finance
contentSnippet: BlackRock is the largest asset manager in the world, with over $13.4 trillion in assets under management, and operates the largest tokenized cash market fund, worth $2.8 billion.

title: SOL, ADA, XRP Zoom 12% as Bitcoin Bounces Above $93K. But Will The Rally Last?
contentSnippet: The recovery followed a washout in derivatives markets, where roughly $457 million in short positions were liquidated in the past 24 hours.

title: Anthropic Starts Early IPO Prep Ahead of Possible 2026 Debut: Report
contentSnippet: Anthropic is reportedly exploring a public market debut while chasing a new funding round that could push its valuation past $300 billion.

title: XRP Surges 8% as Ascending Triangle and Bullish RSI Cross Trigger Fresh Rally
contentSnippet: XRP Ledger network activity surged to multi-year highs, with 40,000 account set operations

title: Ether 'Bear Trap' Confirmed as Bitcoin Probes $93K, XRP Eyes $2.30 Hurdle
contentSnippet: Ether looks north after a confirmed bear trap.

title: UK takes ‘massive step forward,’ passing property laws for crypto
contentSnippet: A bill clarifying that property laws apply to crypto was given royal assent in the UK, with advocates hailing the move as giving crypto “a much clearer legal footing.”

title: カルシが米CNNの公式パートナーに、予測市場のリアルタイムデータを報道に統合
contentSnippet: 米予測市場プラットフォームのカルシがCNNと提携し公式予測市場パートナーになった。カルシのリアルタイムデータがCNN番組全体に統合され、政治的・文化的イベントの確率情報を報道に活用する。ソラナ上でのトークン化予測市場も開始した。

title: Ethereum Whale Buying Steps Up as Market Rebounds From Heavy Liquidations
contentSnippet: Large holders resumed sizeable Ethereum purchases this week as crypto prices recovered sharply from Monday’s wipeout.

title: ストラテジーCEO「米ドル準備金でビットコイン売却回避」、配当戦略を語る
contentSnippet: 米ストラテジー社CEOが今後の準備金や配当戦略を詳細に説明した。米ドル準備金で当面の配当資金を確保し、ビットコイン売却を回避する。レンディング参入の可能性も示唆した。

title: CNN to Use Kalshi Prediction Markets Across Its News Coverage
contentSnippet: The deal brings market-implied probabilities into CNN’s newsroom and introduces a Kalshi-powered ticker for segments that rely on event contracts.

title: Bitcoin surges to $93K after Sunday flush, as analysts eye $100K
contentSnippet: Bitcoin recovered to $93,000 after a leverage flush on Sunday, with analysts now predicting that macro tailwinds could push the cryptocurrency over six figures.

title: イーロンの「Xマネー」決済システム開発で人材募集　ソラナが支援表明
contentSnippet: イーロン・マスク氏のX Moneyが決済プラットフォームの技術責任者を募集。ソラナが協力を表明し、仮想通貨統合の可能性に注目が集まる。WeChat型スーパーアプリ実現への動きを解説。

title: Crypto lobby slams Australian broadcaster’s ‘sensational’ Bitcoin article
contentSnippet: Australia’s government-funded national broadcaster, which reaches an average of over 12 million people, released a report on Tuesday that portrayed Bitcoin as a tool used by criminals with no real use

title: Justice Department Seizes Domain Linked to Burma-Based Crypto Scam Compound
contentSnippet: The U.S. seizure comes a day after a sanctioned Cambodian group shut branches and froze withdrawals under regulatory pressure.

title: Trump hint sends Kevin Hassett Fed chair odds soaring in markets
contentSnippet: Trump hasn’t confirmed who he will have replace Fed Chair Jerome Powell with next year, but two recent hints, taken together, point to his crypto-friendly adviser.

title: 「資産トークン化が金融のあり方を変革」ブラックロックのフィンクCEOらが論説
contentSnippet: ブラックロックのフィンクCEOらが現実資産（RWA）トークン化の可能性を様々な観点から解説した。トークン化の2つの大きな利点や規制当局の役割などにも言及している。

title: Grayscale Launches First US Chainlink ETF on NYSE Arca
contentSnippet: The product saw strong first-day trading after a shutdown-enabled filing path and updated SEC listing standards opened the way for its launch.

title: バイナンス傘下Trust Wallet、予測市場へのアクセス機能をローンチ　ポリマーケットなどに対応へ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ウォレットのTrust Walletは、予測市場にアクセスできる機能をローンチ。まずはMyriad、ポリマーケット、カルシの3つの予測市場に対応する。

title: クラーケン、Backed買収　米国株のトークン化取引を拡大
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所クラーケンがスイスのBacked Finance買収を発表。トークン化株式サービス「xStocks」は半年で取引高100億ドルを突破。RWA市場は2028年に2兆ドル規模へ成長見込み。

title: December Fed cut unlikely, but Bitcoin will be fine: Kevin O’Leary
contentSnippet: Kevin O’Leary said he is not positioning his investments around expectations that the US Federal Reserve will cut rates in December.

title: Kalshi raises $1B at $11B valuation after best volume month
contentSnippet: Kalshi has doubled its valuation after its latest Series E funding round, which come as the prediction market posted record trading volumes last month.

title: Kraken to Acquire Tokenization Platform Backed Finance as Crypto Exchange Extends Buying Spree
contentSnippet: The company said that the transaction would "accelerate the global adoption of xStocks."

title: Crypto Winter Is Not Coming, Myriad Users Say
contentSnippet: In a Myriad prediction market, just 9% of respondents expected a crypto winter.

title: 欧州10銀行がユーロ連動ステーブルコイン発行へ、2026年後半に開始予定
contentSnippet: INGやBNPパリバなど欧州10銀行がユーロ連動ステーブルコイン発行を計画中。新会社キバリスを設立し2026年後半の発行を目指す。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: バンカメ「資産管理サービスの顧客は仮想通貨投資を検討すべき」　最大4%のポートフォリオ配分を推奨
contentSnippet: バンク・オブ・アメリカは、資産管理サービスの顧客に対しポートフォリオの最大4%を仮想通貨などのデジタル資産に配分するように推奨していることがわかった。ビットコイン現物ETFも投資対象にする計画だ。

title: IBIT Among Most-Traded ETFs as Bitcoin Surges; Mining Stocks Sink
contentSnippet: A 6% rally in bitcoin helped push IBIT ahead of major funds like VOO, but crypto miners including IREN and CIFR posted steep losses.

title: ETH briefly touches $3K but traders remain skeptical: Here’s why
contentSnippet: Ether price surged to $3,000 on Tuesday, but lagged behind the US stock market rally as muted demand for ETH derivatives and growth in competing blockchains kept traders skeptical.

title: Rizzmas is Back? Christmas Solana Meme Coin Wakes From Hibernation
contentSnippet: As December starts, meme coin traders are decorating their Christmas trees and buying up Rizzmas tokens.

title: Bitcoin Dipped Below 'Fair Value' for First Time in 2 Years, History Says 132% Gains Next 12 Months
contentSnippet: Network reset complete: leverage flushed, LTHs accumulating and price back above fair value.

title: AAVE Rallies 14% as Bybit, Mantle Integration Connects DeFi Lender to 70M Users
contentSnippet: The DeFi lender's native token broke above key resistance level, eyeing $190 as the next target level.

title: Vanguard Crypto ETFs, Coinbase Lawsuit & Strategy's $1.44B Reserve - Daily Crypto Recap
contentSnippet: Today’s headlines: The latest on Vanguard ETFs, Coinbase lawsuit, Strategy $1.44B reserve, & more. This is Decrypt's Daily Recap with host @Tyler_Did_It. Your crypto round-up for December 2nd 2025

title: What to Expect From Ethereum’s Fusaka Upgrade?
contentSnippet: Ethereum’s latest major network upgrade is coming Wednesday. Here’s what users can expect.
